verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Rechabites, <S%H7397><s%> and speak unto <S%H1696><s%> them, and bring <S%H935><s%> them into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> into <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the chambers, <S%H3957><s%> and give them wine <S%H3196><s%> to drink. <S%H8248><s%>

Then I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Habaziniah, <S%H2262><s%> and his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of the Rechabites; <S%H7397><s%>

And I brought <S%H935><s%> them into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the chamber <S%H3957><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hanan, <S%H2605><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Igdaliah, <S%H3012><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was by <S%H681><s%> the chamber <S%H3957><s%> of the princes, <S%H8269><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> the chamber <S%H3957><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> the keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the door: <S%H5592><s%>

And I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Rechabites <S%H7397><s%> pots <S%H1375><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> and cups, <S%H3563><s%> and I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Drink <S%H8354><s%> ye wine. <S%H3196><s%>

But they said, <S%H559><s%> We will drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wine: <S%H3196><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> Jonadab <S%H3122><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab <S%H7394><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> us, saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye shall drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> neither ye, <S%H859><s%> nor your sons <S%H1121><s%> forever: <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye build <S%H1129><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> sow <S%H2232><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> any: but <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in tents; <S%H168><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may live <S%H2421><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> be strangers. <S%H1481><s%>

Thus have we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jonadab <S%H3082><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab <S%H7394><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath charged <S%H6680><s%> us, to drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H1115><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our days, <S%H3117><s%> we, <S%H587><s%> our wives, <S%H802><s%> our sons, <S%H1121><s%> nor our daughters; <S%H1323><s%>

Nor <S%H1115><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> for us to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in: neither <S%H3808><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> we vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> nor field, <S%H7704><s%> nor seed: <S%H2233><s%>

But we have dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in tents, <S%H168><s%> and have obeyed, <S%H8085><s%> and done <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Jonadab <S%H3122><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us.

But it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> that we said, <S%H559><s%> Come, <S%H935><s%> and let us go <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> for fear <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the army <S%H2428><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> and for fear <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the army <S%H2428><s%> of the Syrians: <S%H758><s%> so we dwell <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Go <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Will ye not <S%H3808><s%> receive <S%H3947><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> to hearken <S%H8085><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my words? <S%H1697><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The words <S%H1697><s%> of Jonadab <S%H3082><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab, <S%H7394><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> not <S%H1115><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> are performed; <S%H6965><s%> for unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they drink <S%H8354><s%> none, <S%H3808><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> their father's <S%H1><s%> commandment: <S%H4687><s%> notwithstanding I <S%H595><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, rising early <S%H7925><s%> and speaking; <S%H1696><s%> but ye hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me.

I have sent <S%H7971><s%> also unto <S%H413><s%> you <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> rising up early <S%H7925><s%> and sending <S%H7971><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> ye now <S%H4994><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from his evil <S%H7451><s%> way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> and amend <S%H3190><s%> your doings, <S%H4611><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H408><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them, and ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to you and to your fathers: <S%H1><s%> but ye have not <S%H3808><s%> inclined <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> your ear, <S%H241><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me.

Because <S%H3588><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jonadab <S%H3082><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab <S%H7394><s%> have performed <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of their father, <S%H1><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them; but this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> and upon <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have pronounced <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them: because <S%H3282><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, but they have not <S%H3808><s%> heard; <S%H8085><s%> and I have called <S%H7121><s%> unto them, but they have not <S%H3808><s%> answered. <S%H6030><s%>

And Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Rechabites, <S%H7397><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Because <S%H3283><s%> <S%H834><s%> ye have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of Jonadab <S%H3082><s%> your father, <S%H1><s%> and kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his precepts, <S%H4687><s%> and done <S%H6213><s%> according unto all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> you:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Jonadab <S%H3122><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab <S%H7394><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> want <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
